title: Demolitionist
summaries: The Demolitionist is an NPC vendor that will spawn once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an empty house.
  • The player has an explosive in the inventory (items stored in storage items like chests, or portable storages like the Piggy Bank do not count).
  • The Merchant is present.
If the Demolitionist is killed, he can freely respawn, without requiring the above conditions to be met again.

If the Demolitionist is killed, he will only respawn if the above conditions are met again. This means an explosive must be placed in the player's inventory again. Having explosives stored in chests or other containers will not fulfill the requirement.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Demolitionist will lob Grenades at nearby enemies to defend himself, which deal 20 / <abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">30</abbr> / <abbr class="master" title="Master Mode">35</abbr> damage at the start of the game.

Moreover, on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, NPCs including the Demolitionist will gain various stat increases as the player progresses.
